docs.text: AddDoc AddDoc Description Success Response Error Response URL : /mongoDb/addDoc Method : POST Description  Use to add a doc doc in the collection collection in the database db Data constraints { "db": "Name of the database", "collection": "Name of the collection", "doc": "Json of the doc to add" } Data example { "db": "testDB", "name": "User", "doc": { "user": "user", {...} } } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "added successfully" } Error Response Status Condition Response 404 If the Db asked doesn't exists { "msg": "${db} is not a DB valid" } 500 If error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: AddDoc

docs.text: AddDoc Description Success Response Error Response URL : /mongoDb/addDoc Method : POST

docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "added successfully" }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 404 If the Db asked doesn't exists { "msg": "${db} is not a DB valid" } 500 If error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: CreateCollection CreateCollection Description Success Response Error Response URL : /mongoDb/createCollection Method : POST Description  Use to create a collection name in the database db Data constraints { "db": "Name of the database", "name": "Name of the collection" } Data example { "db": "testDB", "name": "User" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "created successfully" } Error Response Status Condition Response 404 If the Db asked doesn't exists { "msg": "${db} is not a DB valid" } 500 If error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: GetOneValue GetOneValue Description Success Response Error Response URL : /mongoDb/createCollection Method : POST Description  Use to get value in the mongoDB when a doc contain the value doc Data constraints { "db": "Name of the database", "name": "Name of the collection", "doc": "Json that the Doc have to have" } Data example { "db": "testDB", "name": "User", doc": { "user": "user", {...} } } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { return of the Mongodatabase } Error Response Status Condition Response 404 If the Db asked doesn't exists { "msg": "${db} is not a DB valid" } 500 If error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: CreateUser CreateUser Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/createUser Method : POST Description  Use to create a user in firebase with email password and username Data constraints { "email": "[valid email address]", "password": "[password in plain text]", "username": "[valid username]" } Data example { "email": "alexi@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", "username": "alexisFab" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "uid": "[user uid]" } Error Response Status Condition Response 500 If username , email , password are wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: CreateUser

docs.text: CreateUser Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/createUser Method : POST
docs.title: CreateUser

docs.text: Use to create a user in firebase with email password and username Data constraints { "email": "[valid email address]", "password": "[password in plain text]", "username": "[valid username]" } Data example { "email": "alexi@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", "username": "alexisFab" }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "uid": "[user uid]" }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 500 If username , email , password are wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: Error Response

docs.text: DeleteUser DeleteUser Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/deleteUser Method : POST Description  Use to delete a user in firebase with token Data constraints { "tokenID": "[TokenID provided by firebase]" } Data example { "tokenID": "4f5sd7gf1k564sdf7..." } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "User deleted" } Error Response Status Condition Response 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: GetService GetService Description Success Response Error Response URL : /services/get Method : GET Description  Use to get information of the service service Data constraints { "service": "[Name of the service asked]" } Data example { "service": "gmail" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "service": "information about the service" } Error Response Code : 404 not found Status Condition Response 404 If `service` is unknown { "msg": "Service not found" }
